    • Uses of ItemScorer in org.grouplens.lenskit.baseline

      Classes in org.grouplens.lenskit.baseline that implement ItemScorer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConstantItemScorer
      Rating scorer that predicts a constant rating for all items.
      class  FallbackItemScorer
      Item scorer that combines a primary scorer with a baseline.
      class  GlobalMeanRatingItemScorer
      Rating scorer that predicts the global mean rating for all items.
      class  ItemMeanRatingItemScorer
      Rating scorer that returns the item's mean rating for all predictions.
      class  LeastSquaresItemScorer
      Baseline scorer using least-squares estimates of preferences, trained by gradient descent.
      class  UserMeanItemScorer
      Rating scorer that returns the user's average rating for all predictions.
      Constructors in org.grouplens.lenskit.baseline with parameters of type ItemScorer 
      Constructor and Description
      FallbackItemScorer(ItemScorer primary, ItemScorer baseline) 
      UserMeanItemScorer(UserEventDAO dao, ItemScorer base, UserHistorySummarizer sum, double damp)
      Construct a scorer that computes user means offset by the global mean.
